UDEFLargeAggregator.mainSelect: select v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --1 a.operando, --2 to_char(d.dt_inizio_fornitura, 'yyyymmdd') , --3 case when to_char(d.dt_fine_fornitura,'yyyymmdd') is null then '99991231'ELSE to_char(d.dt_fine_fornitura,'yyyymmdd') end case,--4 b.id_operando , --5 a.CTAR1 ,a.tipo --6 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_parametro_operando_large a, z_anagrafica_operandi b , DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where a.ctar1=v.ctar1 and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 21' ) and a.operando = b.operando and d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR -- and a.cd_parametro=e.cd_parametro_valore_large and b.tipo = 'USERDEF' and a.tipo= v.cfreq and v.ctar1 ='STD_GDS1' group by v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --1 a.operando, --2 to_char(d.dt_inizio_fornitura, 'yyyymmdd') , --3 to_char(d.dt_fine_fornitura,'yyyymmdd'), b.id_operando , --5 a.CTAR1 ,a.tipo

UDEFExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY, --4 FACTS_F_UDEF.TIPO, --5 FACTS_F_UDEF.OPERAND, --6 FACTS_F_UDEF.SAISON,--7 FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG, --8 FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY, --9 FACTS_V_UDEF.TIPO,--10 FACTS_V_UDEF.AB, --11 FACTS_V_UDEF.BIS, --12 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL1, --13 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL2,--14 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL3,--15 FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL4,--16 FACTS_V_UDEF.TARIFART, --17 FACTS_V_UDEF.KONDGIR, --18 FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG --19 FROM FACTS_KEY,FACTS_F_UDEF,FACTS_V_UDEF WHERE FACTS_KEY.LEGACY = FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY AND FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY = FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY and FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG = FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG order by FACTS_F_UDEF.prog
